Uses of Interface
org.apache.lucene.util.hnsw.RandomVectorScorer

  • Packages that use RandomVectorScorer 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.util.hnsw
    Navigable Small-World graph, nominally Hierarchical but currently only has a single layer.

    • Uses of RandomVectorScorer in org.apache.lucene.util.hnsw

      Creates a default scorer for float vectors.
      RandomVectorScorer RandomVectorScorerSupplier.scorer​(int ord)
      This creates a RandomVectorScorer for scoring random nodes in batches against the given ordinal.
